text: inna anzalna l-tawrata fiha hudan wanurun yahkumu biha l-nabiyuna alladhina aslamu lilladhina hadu wal-rabaniyuna wal-ahbaru bima us'tuh'fizu min kitabi l-lahi wakanu Ê¿alayhi shuhadaa fala takhshawu l-nasa wa-ikh'shawni wala tashtaru biayati thamanan qalilan waman lam yahkum bima anzala l-lahu fa-ulaika humu l-kafiruna
